name: The Fall
description:
New interpretation and homage to the Scottish American Memorial by Canadian Scottish artist R. Tait McKenzie. The statue is in Edinburgh Princes Street gardens and was erected in 1927. It shows a seated kilted soldier on a plinth with a rifle held across his knees about to rise to head to the front.

Now over 100 years after the end of the first world war there are no World War One veterans left alive who can pass on their wisdom from what they experienced.
